Description: Book of the Dead of Kerqun; frame 1; Judgement scene in black outline with some red detail.
Curator's comments: Mosher, Malcom Jr. 2016. The Book of the Dead, Saite through Ptolemaic periods : a study of traditions evident in versions of texts and vignettes (SPBD Studies), vol. I (BD Spells 1-15) and II (BD Spells 16, 18-30), Charleston. Quirke, Stephen. 1993. Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (British Museum Occasional Papers 92), London.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57036) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57036)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2007 4 Jun-14 Sept, London, Wellcome Collection, The Heart
